title: Windows 8 Pro-x86-Untouched-DVD+Permanent Activator@Anirban
description:
how to install windows 8 pro?
you can install this windows 8 with and without any dvd or pen drive..

process 1:-
1. extract this file by "win rar"
2. double click on "setup.exe"
3. install will start automatically..
machine will restart while installing..

process 2:-
1. burn this iso file into your pen drive or dvd.


__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
always remember to make the update setings on never check for update, As update is not useful. it occupies hard disk space and makes machine slow.
__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
check your my computer properties. you will find that uour wondows will expire in 30 days.. so dont panic..

open Permanent Activator> Windows 8 permanent actovator>Windows 8 permanent activator.(first check pics). restart your machine and your windows is activated...


*****************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************
folder BONUS contain Windows7-USB-DVD-tool. this softwire is for burn pendrive as well as dvd..

hope it helps you a lot..
